subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Disabilities
Tennis
Amputation
lead_paragraph: Ryan McIntosh, 23, and Denise Castelli, 26, are two amputees among the 252 ball boys and girls at the United States Open, although some fans don’t notice any disabilities.
snippet: Ryan McIntosh, 23, and Denise Castelli, 26, are two amputees among the 252 ball boys and girls at the United States Open, although some fans don’t notice any disabilities.
